name: Dead Hang
description: Hanging from bar with arms straight

name: Active Hang
description: Dead hang with shoulders engaged (depressed and retracted)
form_cues: Pull shoulders down away from ears

name: Scapular Pulls
description: Hanging from bar, pull shoulder blades down without bending arms

name: Arch Hangs
description: Hang from bar with shoulders active and body in slight arch
unlock_requirements: 10 reps x 3 sets of Scapular Pulls
form_cues: Pull chest to bar, keep shoulders active

name: Chin-up Hold
description: Hold at top of chin-up position

name: One-Arm Dead Hang
description: Hanging from bar with one arm

name: One-Arm Active Hang
description: One-arm hang with active shoulder engagement
unlock_requirements: 20s hold each arm of One-Arm Dead Hang

name: One-Arm Flex Hang
description: One-arm hang with arm flexed at 90°
unlock_requirements: 15s hold each arm of One-Arm Active Hang

name: Swing Progression
unlock_requirements: 10s hold each arm of One-Arm Flex Hang
